head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: saxon:unparsed-entities()

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: saxon:unparsed-entities()

body.p: This function returns a list of the names of the unparsed entities declared with the document node supplied as $doc. These names can then be used as arguments to the standard XSLT functions unparsed-entity-uri() and unparsed-entity-public-id() to determine the system and public identifiers of the unparsed entity.
